snippet: Louise M. Slaughter, a 13-term New York Democrat, can only watch from a wheelchair as her Republican opponent meets voters and raises funds.
abstract: Rep Louise M Slaughter is the oldest woman in Congress at age 82 and has represented Rochester, NY, for a quarter century; she is seeking re-election but, because of an accident, can only watch from a wheelchair as her Republican opponent, Maggie A Brooks, meets voters and raises funds; redistricting has left her with a new, more conservative constituency that is less favorable to Democrats than her previous district.
lead_paragraph: Louise M. Slaughter, a 13-term New York Democrat, can only watch from a wheelchair as her Republican opponent meets voters and raises funds.

headline.seo: Congresswoman Slaughter Bent on Pursuing Election, Broken Leg and All
headline.main: Broken Leg Adds Hurdle to Her Quest, at 82, for 14th House Term
headline.print_headline: Broken Leg Adds Hurdle to Her Quest, at 82, for 14th House Term
